item.title: About Markdown Formatting
item.description:
About Markdown Formatting

This post demonstrates various Markdown formatting options.

Headings

You can use headings to structure your content:

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Text Formatting

You can make text bold, italic, or bold and italic.

You can also use strikethrough text.

Lists

Unordered Lists

  • Item one
  • Item two
    • Nested item
    • Another nested item
  • Item three

Ordered Lists

  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

Code

You can include inline code in your text.

item.title: Sample Post with Images and Tags
item.description:
Sample Post with Images and Tags

This post demonstrates how to use images and tags in your blog posts.

About Images

When adding images to your blog, you can:

  1. Place them in the static/ directory
  2. Reference them using standard Markdown syntax
![Alt text](/images/your-image.jpg)

Using Tags

Tags help organize your content. This post has the following tags:

  • sample
  • images
  • blogging

Readers can click on tags to find related content.

Categories

Categories provide another way to group your posts. This post is in the “General” category.

item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog!

This is my first post on this Hugo blog. I’m using the PaperMod theme, which provides a clean and modern design.

Getting Started

Hugo is a fast and flexible static site generator. With PaperMod theme, you get:

  • Beautiful minimalist design
  • Built-in search functionality
  • Responsive layout
  • Fast page loads

What’s Next

I’ll be adding more content soon. Stay tuned!
